meanings.definition: The act of adding an extra element to something in order to enhance or complete it.
meanings.sent1: Her supplementations to the recipe made the dish even more delicious.
meanings.sent2: The supplementations to the presentation really improved its overall impact.
meanings.sent3: His supplementations to the story added a fun twist to the plot.
meanings.sent4: The supplementations to the garden transformed it into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The supplementations to the outfit made it stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: Something that is added to something else in order to enhance or complete it.
meanings.sent1: The supplementations of extra toppings on the pizza made it even tastier.
meanings.sent2: Her supplementations of accessories to the outfit really elevated its style.
meanings.sent3: The supplementations of jokes during the meeting lightened the mood.
meanings.sent4: The supplementations of spices to the dish gave it a burst of flavor.
meanings.sent5: His supplementations of ideas to the project brought fresh perspectives.
